message.body: No new bites today?
Nope!!!
Thanks for asking!!!
Yay!!!
Keeping my fingers crossed!!!
￼Avery organized the closet!! Wooooah!
That is awesome. Can you ask Alex if she has a key to the door? I'd like to keep it locked.
Both Brian & Ger organized it in the last year & it keeps getting messed up.
How are we today? Fingers crossed!!
Good!!! Still no bites!! So happyhappyhappy!
Thank you for asking !
I'm really really psyched!! I think this nightmare might just be over. I think it is high time it up & ends.
Good news Bad news. Phillip said he has suspicious bites. Cindy is coming tomorrow to look at his room.
Yup he told me that too
I have none But I have been drying my blankets n pillows every night and still am a bit away from wall just to be safe :) but I mean, as long as I'm not getting bit I'm fine
I def realize that one or two turn into an infestation super quick tho, so glad Cindy is coming and Phillip is drying his stuff, etc, and we are replacing sofas, etc and got a vacuum yayayayay!!!
I put the vac together and used it on living room/front room rug and it was GrEaT
It kinda sucks because I had asked Cindy to look at his room when she was there on Wednesday. He was home but she forgot to check. We probably could have gotten the rest then......
Thank you for putting together the vacuum. How long did it take you? I want to pay you for your time.
In Cindy's defense she is doing her regular routes plus all of Beth's stuff since Beth blew out her knee. So she is totally overworked.
It's fine it didn't take any time! It's normal living stuff. I really love vacuuming and doing dishes lol
I really HATE grocery shopping tho. Weird quirks I dunno
But yeah no worries and thank you for the vac!!!
That's funny. My fiancée is grocery shopping right now but hates shopping. When you sent that I thought it was from here.
She had just written me - "I'm in shopping hell"
I hate doing dishes but I do find something meditative about it.
Lol I truly despise it. But I will do other peoples dishes and do dishes just to *relax*
I find it very soothing
Lol I really really hate grocery stores
I get anxiety when faced w so many option a
I actually don't mind shopping. But I am the kind of person who checks & compares prices etc.
Like, buying toothpaste will send me into a ten minute anxiety trip bc Which one do I get!??? Or like, there are ten tomato sauces, which one is best?!! Ugh
Lolol tell you fiancé I totally get it. Ugh and the Florescent lights!! The worst!! Always gives me a tummy ache!??
Hahaha!!! Jo said years ago she sometimes would spend an hour filling up a cart & get to some small decision & freak out & just leave the whole cart & leave.
Yeah. I doesn't bother me too much. I'd just rather be doing something else.
Yes!!!!!!! I've done that!!!!!!!
I've totally done that!!!!
Lately I have really gotten into podcasts mostly NPR stuff. Occasionally Preston & Steve. With shopping or the dishes - I just put on my headphones & listen to the story.
Does she also freak out at Subway?!!!

Does she just tell them to put on whatever they think would be good? And then do her friends give her a hard time for making the subway person's job hard??? But is she doing it bc the choices Genuinely overwhelm her!? Bc that's happened to me!
I'm not sure she has been to a subway before. Probably but not with me. She is a pescatarian & I think subway menu is a little limiting for her. Though she used to love Wawa cheese hoagies.
Omg see dishes are like my oasis. I look Forward to coming home and doing dishes. It's the first thing I go for when I enter the house bc it's just so soothing and there are Zero choices
You can't screw it up!
And you can be w your own daydreams
But shopping takes Focus, which is anxiety producing
If you daydream, you're in people's way and everyone's rushing w the carts omg
Your fiancé is a keeper! Wawa hoagies are lovely
There is something Zen about doing the dishes. I like to zone out & just listen to something funny or interesting.
Yesss !
Yeah. She is pretty awesome. Hopefully you will meet her someday soon. Alex has met her. David is one of Jo's all time favorite people. She loves him & all the Lost Boys!!
Shopping takes focus part of the time. A lot of the stuff you buy again & again. But things that I need to focus on, I just pause the story.
When you get a chance - Can you send me some pictures of your floor?
I LOVE getting pictures!!
